statements: SELECT * FROM government_projects WHERE project_name = 'Infrastructure Improvement Project';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM government_projects WHERE budget > 1000000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM government_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM government_projects ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM government_projects WHERE budget > 100000 ORDER BY budget DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM government_projects WHERE budget BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM government_projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM government_projects WHERE budget < 50000 OR budget > 200000 ORDER BY budget ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM government_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_projects;
SELECT * FROM government_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, description FROM government_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM government_projects WHERE project_name = 'Infrastructure Development';
SELECT initiative_name, description, start_date FROM government_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM government_projects WHERE end_date < '2023-06-30';
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM government_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_initiatives WHERE description LIKE '%sustainable%';
SELECT * FROM government_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM government_projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT initiative_name, department FROM government_initiatives WHERE department = 'Education' ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, budget FROM government_projects WHERE budget BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM government_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT initiative_name, department, start_date FROM government_initiatives WHERE department = 'Health' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_projects WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY initiative_name
SELECT * FROM project_evaluation WHERE evaluation_date > '2022-07-01' ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM government_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM government_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, project_description FROM government_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM project_teams;
SELECT project_id, metric_name, metric_value, metric_date FROM project_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, project_description FROM government_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM government_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM government_projects JOIN project_metrics ON government_projects.project_id = project_metrics.project_id WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, team_name, team_lead FROM government_projects JOIN project_teams ON government_projects.project_id = project_teams.project_id WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY team_name ASC;

SELECT project_name, budget_amount, budget_year FROM government_projects JOIN project_budgets ON government_projects.project_id = project_budgets.project_id WHERE budget_year = 2022 ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_cost FROM projects WHERE project_cost > 10000;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM project_team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, evaluation_criteria, evaluation_score FROM project_evaluation WHERE evaluation_score >= 90 ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_cost FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_member_count FROM project_team WHERE team_id > 3 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-10-01' AND project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM projects WHERE project_cost > 5000) ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, progress_notes FROM project_tasks JOIN project_progress ON project_tasks.task_id = project_progress.task_id WHERE completion_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, evaluation_criteria, evaluation_score FROM projects JOIN project_evaluation USING (project_id) WHERE evaluation_score >= 80 ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC, project_name ASC;
